items.sentence: I know that I'll be happy when Tom gets home.
I know Tom won't be interested in doing that.
I know Tom knows why I don't like to do that.
I know Tom isn't quite as tall as his father.
I know Tom is a better tennis player than me.
It was clear that Tom didn't plan to do that.
It was clear Tom was going to do that for me.
I'm pretty sure that everything will go well.
I wish that I didn't have to do that anymore.
I was starting to think that you'd forgotten.
